SemesterRegistrationNotice.title: NOTICE
SemesterRegistrationNotice.subject: Online Semester Registration for 2nd Semester Students of ITEP (B.Sc. B.Ed)
SemesterRegistrationNotice.forWhom: All 1st year ITEP (B.Sc. - B.Ed) students promoted to the second semester
instructions: Students are required to log in to their MIS account at https://mis.nita.ac.in and use the online payment link.
Payment through offline or any other mode is not acceptable.
Subject registration is mandatory after successful fee payment.
Proof of semester registration must be submitted to the Department.
No requests for extension of the registration date or waivers of late fees will be considered.
